Question: This person had been the target of many threats since the 1950s, often without his knowledge.
Hints: Enrolled at Humes High School, this person received only a C in music in eighth grade.
This blend of styles made it difficult for this person's music to find radio airplay.
In 1957, Robert Mitchum asked this person to costar with him in Thunder Road, on which Mitchum was writer and producer.
